mean_cn: n. 手风琴；  adj. 可折叠的
mean_en: a musical instrument that you hold in both hands to produce sounds. You press the two ends together and pull them apart and press buttons and/or keys to produce the different notes.
sentence: Bob has mastered the accordion after 10 years of playing.
sentence_trans: 鲍勃弹了10年的手风琴，现在已经精通了。
word_etyma: accord和谐 + ion物 → 奏出和谐音乐之物 → 手风琴
